# ByteArrayExtensions.Swap method

Returns an array of bytes by exchanging bytes.

```csharp
public static byte[] Swap(this byte[] data)
```

| parameter | description |
| --- | --- |
| data | Byte array to analyze. |

## Return Value

A byte Array that contains the result.
